SELECT COLUMN_NAME field_name, COLUMN_COMMENT field_comment, IF(IS_NULLABLE,1,0) is_nullable, ( CASE DATA_TYPE WHEN 'double' THEN 0 WHEN 'int' THEN 1 WHEN 'decimal' THEN 2 WHEN 'varchar' THEN 3 WHEN 'tinyint' THEN 4 WHEN 'datetime' THEN 5 WHEN 'date' THEN 6 WHEN 'time' THEN 7 WHEN 'bolb' THEN 8 WHEN 'text' THEN 9 WHEN 'mediumtext' THEN 10 WHEN 'longtext' THEN 11 ELSE 12 END ) field_type, IFNULL(CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH,NUMERIC_PRECISION) field_length, NUMERIC_SCALE decimal_digits, ORDINAL_POSITION order_num, 1 status FROM information_schema.columns
TABLE_SCHEMA = #{database} AND
TABLE_NAME = #{table}
ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION

SELECT INDEX_NAME indexName, COLUMN_NAME indexField, NON_UNIQUE indexType, SEQ_IN_INDEX orderNum, 1 status FROM information_schema.statistics
TABLE_SCHEMA = #{database} AND
TABLE_NAME = #{table}
ORDER BY INDEX_NAME,SEQ_IN_INDEX

SELECT TABLE_NAME tableName, TABLE_SCHEMA databaseName, TABLE_COMMENT tableComment, ISNULL(AUTO_INCREMENT) primaryKeyType, 1 status FROM information_schema.tables WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' AND TABLE_SCHEMA != 'mysql' AND TABLE_SCHEMA != 'information_schema' AND TABLE_SCHEMA != 'performance_schema' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'sys_%' ORDER BY TABLE_SCHEMA
